sqlMap.select: SELECT /* TMMD0310.SEARCH00 */ A.OBJECT_NAME AS TABLE_NAME , B.COMMENTS AS TABLE_COMMENTS FROM USER_OBJECTS A INNER JOIN USER_TAB_COMMENTS B ON A.OBJECT_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME WHERE A.OBJECT_TYPE IN ('TABLE', 'VIEW') AND A.TEMPORARY = 'N' ORDER BY A.OBJECT_NAME

SELECT /* TMMD0310.SEARCH01 */ DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DECODE(A.COLUMN_NAME,'UPDT_DATE', '-1', 'UPDT_USID', '0', A.COLUMN_ID)), 1, ' i', ' ,i') || A.COLUMN_NAME || ' IN ' || A.TABLE_NAME || '.' || A.COLUMN_NAME || '%TYPE /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS) ||' */' AS CODE FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# AND A.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('INST_DATE','INST_USID') /*최초 등록일 및 등록자 제외*/ ORDER BY DECODE(A.COLUMN_NAME, 'UPDT_DATE', -1, 'UPDT_USID', 0, A.COLUMN_ID)

SELECT /* TMMD0310.SEARCH02 */ SELECTSYN AS CODE FROM (SELECT 0 AS ORD , ' SELECT /* 조회주석ID수정바람 */' AS SELECTSYN FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT A.COLUMN_ID AS ORD ,DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID), 1, ' ', ' , ') || 'A.' || A.COLUMN_NAME || ' /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS)||' */' AS SELECTSYN FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# AND A.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('INST_DATE', 'INST_USID', 'UPDT_DATE', 'UPDT_USID') UNION ALL SELECT 2000 AS ORD , ' FROM ' || #TABLE_NAME# || ' A /* [' || COMMENTS || '] */' AS SELECTSYN FROM USER_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# UNION ALL SELECT 3000 AS ORD , DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COLUMN_ID), 1, ' WHERE A.', ' AND A.') || A.COLUMN_NAME || ' = ##' || A.COLUMN_NAME || '## /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS)||' */' AS SELECTSYN FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# AND A.COLUMN_NAME IN (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS WHERE CONSTRAINT_NAME = (SELECT CONSTRAINT_NAME FROM USER_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND TABLE_NAME =#TABLE_NAME#)) ) A ORDER BY ORD

SELECT /* TMMD0310.SEARCH03 */ INSERTSYN AS CODE FROM (SELECT 0 AS ORD ,' INSERT INTO ' || #TABLE_NAME# || ' ( /* 저장주석수정바람 *//* [' || COMMENTS || '] */' AS INSERTSYN FROM USER_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# UNION ALL SELECT A.COLUMN_ID AS ORD ,DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID), 1, ' ',' ,') || A.COLUMN_NAME || ' /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS)||' */' AS INSERTSYN FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# UNION ALL SELECT 1000 AS ORD ,' )' AS INSERTSYN FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 1001 AS ORD ,' VALUES (' AS INSERTSYN FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 1001 + A.COLUMN_ID AS ORD ,DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID), 1, ' ##',' ,##') || DECODE(A.COLUMN_NAME, 'INST_DATE', 'UPDT_DATE', 'INST_USID', 'UPDT_USID', A.COLUMN_NAME) || '## /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS)||' */' AS INSERTSYN FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# UNION ALL SELECT 10000, ' )' FROM DUAL) A ORDER BY ORD

SELECT /* TMMD0310.SEARCH04 */ UPDATESYN AS CODE FROM (SELECT 0 AS ORD ,' UPDATE ' || #TABLE_NAME# || ' /* 수정주석수정바람 *//* [' || COMMENTS || '] */' AS UPDATESYN FROM USER_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# UNION ALL SELECT A.COLUMN_ID AS ORD ,DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID), 1, ' SET ', ' , ') || A.COLUMN_NAME || ' = ##' || A.COLUMN_NAME || '## /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS)||' */' AS UPDATESYN FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# AND A.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS WHERE CONSTRAINT_NAME = (SELECT CONSTRAINT_NAME FROM USER_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND TABLE_NAME =#TABLE_NAME#)) AND A.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('INST_DATE','INST_USID') UNION ALL SELECT 1000 + COLUMN_ID ,DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COLUMN_ID), 1, ' WHERE ', ' AND ') || A.COLUMN_NAME || ' = ##' || A.COLUMN_NAME || '## /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS)||' */' AS UPDATESYN FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# AND A.COLUMN_NAME IN (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS WHERE CONSTRAINT_NAME = (SELECT CONSTRAINT_NAME FROM USER_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND TABLE_NAME =#TABLE_NAME#)) ) A ORDER BY ORD

SELECT /* TMMD0310.SEARCH05 */ ' DELETE FROM ' || #TABLE_NAME# || ' /* 삭제주석수정바람 *//* [' ||COMMENTS || '] */' AS CODE FROM USER_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# UNION ALL SELECT DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COLUMN_ID), 1, ' WHERE ', ' AND ') || A.COLUMN_NAME || ' = ##' || A.COLUMN_NAME || '## /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS)||' */' FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# AND A.COLUMN_NAME IN (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS WHERE CONSTRAINT_NAME = (SELECT CONSTRAINT_NAME FROM USER_CONSTRAINTS WHERE CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND TABLE_NAME =#TABLE_NAME#))

SELECT /* TMMD0310.SEARCH06 */ DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID), 1, ' ', ' ,') || '"' || A.COLUMN_NAME || '" /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS)||' */' AS CODE FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# AND A.COLUMN_NAME IN (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM USER_CONS_COLUMNS WHERE CONSTRAINT_NAME = (SELECT CONSTRAINT_NAME FROM USER_CONSTRAINTS WHERE constraint_type = 'P' AND TABLE_NAME =#TABLE_NAME#)) ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID

SELECT /* TMMD0310.SEARCH07 */ DECODE(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID), 1, ' ', ' ,') || '"' || A.COLUMN_NAME || '" /* ' || TRIM(B.COMMENTS)||' */' AS CODE FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# AND A.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('INST_DATE','INST_USID', 'UPDT_DATE', 'UPDT_USID') ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID

SELECT /* TMMD0310.SEARCH08 */ ' <Column id="' || column_name || '" size="' || DECODE(data_type, 'NUMBER', data_precision , DECODE(char_used, 'B', data_length, 'C', char_length)) || '" prop="default" type="' || decode(data_type, 'NVARCHAR2', 'STRING', 'VARCHAR2', 'STRING', 'CHAR', 'STRING', 'NUMBER', 'BIGDECIMAL') || '"/>' AS CODE FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = #TABLE_NAME# AND COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('INST_DATE','INST_USID', 'UPDT_DATE', 'UPDT_USID') ORDER BY COLUMN_ID
